org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.ui.commons.controller.custom

Class InstantiableReinitializableSplitControllerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.ui.commons.controller.custom.InstantiableReinitializableSplitControllerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstantiableController, InstantiableControllerView, InstantiableReinitializableControllerView, Reinitializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SongsController, SongsGroupsController

    public abstract class InstantiableReinitializableSplitControllerView
extends java.lang.Object
implements InstantiableReinitializableControllerView
    Represents an InstantiableReinitializableControllerView that has a split pane and thus is able to add and remove panes to it.

    This controller automatically handles the adjustment of the split pane dividers by using the last value the dividers had.

    See Also:
    InstantiableReinitializableControllerView

    • Method Detail

      • addLastPane

        protected void addLastPane(javafx.scene.Node node)
        Adds a pane to the split pane on the last position.

        The new node count can't exceed the declared count (getMaximumPaneCount()).

        Parameters:
        node - the node to add

      • removeLastPane

        protected void removeLastPane(boolean removeOnlyIfFullfilled)
        Removes the last pane of the split pane.
        Parameters:
        removeOnlyIfFullfilled - if true then the last node is removed only if the current count of panes inside the split panes match the quantity of getMaximumPaneCount(), otherwise the last pane is removed without this check

      • removePane

        protected void removePane(int index)
        Removes the pane from the split pane at the given index
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the pane to remove from the list of panes of the split pane. The index must be in a valid bound

      • getMaximumPaneCount

        protected abstract int getMaximumPaneCount()
        Returns the maximum number of panes the split pane can host.
        Returns:
        the max count of panes inside the split pane
